Frontend: Main view::add new posts with text-only, or picture and text
Frontend: Main view::sidebar shows followed users with profile pictures and statues
Frontend: Main view::add and remove followed users

Backend: Site is hosted on Heroku
Backend: GET /status returns a status messages
Backend: PUT /status updates the status message GET /status returns
Backend: GET /statuses/:users returns a status messages, you do not need to return more than one status
Backend: GET /posts returns at least three posts
Backend: POST /post returns a newly added post, and adds post to results for GET /posts
Backend: GET /posts/:id returns the desired post by post id
Backend: implement GET /posts and GET /posts/:id as one endpoint not two
Backend: Unit test to validate PUT /status
Backend: Unit test to validate POST /post
